item.title: Redis
item.description: Getting started Getting started Start Redis 1 $ redis-server Connect to redis (Redis CLI client) 1 $ redis-cli Connect to redis (telnet) 1 $ telnet 127.0.0.1 6379 Hello World Ping 1 2 redis> PING PONG Hello World 1 2 3 4 redis> SET mykey "Hello world" OK redis> GET mykey "Hello world" Basic Data types Strings Lists Hashes Sets Sorted Sets Redis supports 5 basic data types
